name: Reportit
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
[ReportIt](http://rrshaban.github.io/ReportIt) was developed by three Swarthmore Students with a desire to strengthen the voices of people within  communities. Have a complaint about something that you believe the government should know about? Want to know what problems are happening within your community and try to pool together resources to solve it? ReportIt.

Built by Razi Shaban (@rrshaban), Sedinam Worlanyo (@sedinam), and Amy Han (@raizel17).

[ReportIt](http://rrshaban.github.io/ReportIt) is built with [Flask](http://flask.pocoo.org/docs/0.10/), [SQLite3](http://www.sqlite.org/), [Jinja2](http://jinja.pocoo.org/docs/dev/), [gmaps.js](https://hpneo.github.io/gmaps/), [jQuery](http://jquery.com/), and (regretfully) [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
